# hostinfo processor

<!-- distribution links hack -->

<!-- end autogenerated section -->

`hostinfo` processor is metric type of processor consisting of multiple different "processor modules". Every such module modifies metric stream in manner of its nature.

## Available modules

Currently implemented feature modules follows:

| Module Name | Description                                   |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| [interface] | Module providing interface additional details |

### Developer's guide

If there is a need for some guidance when developing new module try to use this [developer's guide]

## General processor configuration

Modules are configured in row under `hostinfo` processor declaration.

```yaml
processors:
  hostinfo:
    <processor_module_1_settings>
    <processor_module_2_settings>
    ...
```

### Currently available modules configuration

Configuration of modules is optional. Some of them might be used, while others might be avoided.

```yaml
processors:
  hostinfo:
    interface:
      <interface_settings>
```

[developer's guide]: docs/developers_guide.md
[development]: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector#development
[interface]: internal/interfaces/documentation.md
